21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.Opt.none;
24  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.Opt.some;
25  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.anyObject;
26  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.createNiceMock;
27  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.eq;
28  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expect;
29  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expectLastCall;
30  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.isNull;
31  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.replay;
32  
33  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.objects.event.Event;
34  import org.opencastproject.index.service.api.IndexService;
35  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackage;
36  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.identifier.IdImpl;
37  import org.opencastproject.security.api.UnauthorizedException;
38  import org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException;
39  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.RetryStrategy;
40  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowDefinition;
41  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowDefinitionImpl;
42  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowInstance;
43  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationInstance;
44  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService;
45  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowSet;
46  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowStateException;
47  
48  import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
49  import com.google.common.collect.Sets;
50  
51  import org.junit.Ignore;
52  
53  import java.time.Instant;
54  import java.util.Arrays;
55  import java.util.Date;
56  
57  import javax.ws.rs.Path;
58  
59  @Path("/")
60  @Ignore
61  public class TestWorkflowsEndpoint extends WorkflowsEndpoint {
62  
63    public TestWorkflowsEndpoint() throws Exception {
64  
65      this.endpointBaseUrl = "https://api.opencast.org";
66  
67      long runningWorkflowId = 84L;
68      long stoppedWorkflowId = 42L;
69      long missingWorkflowId = 24L;
70      long unauthorizedWorkflowId = 12L;
71  
72      WorkflowOperationInstance woi1 = createNiceMock(WorkflowOperationInstance.class);
73      expect(woi1.getId()).andReturn(1234L);
74      expect(woi1.getTemplate()).andReturn("my-op");
75      expect(woi1.getDescription()).andReturn("Example Operation");
76      expect(woi1.getState()).andReturn(WorkflowOperationInstance.OperationState.RUNNING);
77      expect(woi1.getTimeInQueue()).andReturn(20L);
78      expect(woi1.getExecutionHost()).andReturn("http://localhost:8080");
79      expect(woi1.getExecutionCondition()).andReturn("${letfail}");
80      expect(woi1.isFailOnError()).andReturn(true);
81      expect(woi1.getExceptionHandlingWorkflow()).andReturn("fail");
82      expect(woi1.getRetryStrategy()).andReturn(RetryStrategy.RETRY);
83      expect(woi1.getMaxAttempts()).andReturn(42);
84      expect(woi1.getFailedAttempts()).andReturn(1);
85      expect(woi1.getDateStarted()).andReturn(Date.from(Instant.parse("2018-01-01T12:00:00Z"))).anyTimes();
86      expect(woi1.getConfigurationKeys()).andReturn(Sets.newHashSet("key", "foo"));
87      expect(woi1.getConfiguration("key")).andReturn("value");
88      expect(woi1.getConfiguration("foo")).andReturn("bar");
89      replay(woi1);
90  
91      WorkflowOperationInstance woi2 = createNiceMock(WorkflowOperationInstance.class);
92      expect(woi2.getId()).andReturn(5678L);
93      expect(woi2.getTemplate()).andReturn("my-op2");
94      expect(woi2.getDescription()).andReturn("Example Operation2");
95      expect(woi2.getState()).andReturn(WorkflowOperationInstance.OperationState.SUCCEEDED);
96      expect(woi2.getTimeInQueue()).andReturn(30L);
97      expect(woi2.getExecutionHost()).andReturn("http://localhost:8080");
98      expect(woi2.isFailOnError()).andReturn(false);
99      expect(woi2.getRetryStrategy()).andReturn(RetryStrategy.HOLD);
100     expect(woi2.getMaxAttempts()).andReturn(0);
101     expect(woi2.getFailedAttempts()).andReturn(0);
102     expect(woi2.getDateStarted()).andReturn(Date.from(Instant.parse("2018-02-03T12:00:00Z"))).anyTimes();
103     expect(woi2.getDateCompleted()).andReturn(Date.from(Instant.parse("2018-02-03T13:14:15Z"))).anyTimes();
104     expect(woi2.getConfigurationKeys()).andReturn(Sets.newHashSet("abcd"));
105     expect(woi2.getConfiguration("abcd")).andReturn("1234");
106     replay(woi2);
107 
108     MediaPackage mp = createNiceMock(MediaPackage.class);
109     expect(mp.getIdentifier()).andReturn(new IdImpl("905672ed-181c-4d60-b7cd-02758f61e713")).anyTimes();
110     replay(mp);
111 
112     MediaPackage mpWithRunningWorkflow = createNiceMock(MediaPackage.class);
113     replay(mpWithRunningWorkflow);
114 
115     WorkflowInstance runningWorkflow = createNiceMock(WorkflowInstance.class);
116     expect(runningWorkflow.getId()).andReturn(runningWorkflowId).anyTimes();
117     expect(runningWorkflow.getTitle()).andReturn("Running Workflow");
118     expect(runningWorkflow.getDescription()).andReturn("A running workflow");
119     expect(runningWorkflow.getTemplate()).andReturn("fast");
120     expect(runningWorkflow.getMediaPackage()).andReturn(mp);
121     expect(runningWorkflow.getCreatorName()).andReturn("User1");
122     expect(runningWorkflow.getState()).andReturn(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState.RUNNING);
123     expect(runningWorkflow.getOperations()).andReturn(Lists.newArrayList(woi1));
124     expect(runningWorkflow.getConfigurationKeys()).andReturn(Sets.newHashSet("efgh"));
125     expect(runningWorkflow.getConfiguration("efgh")).andReturn("5678");
126     replay(runningWorkflow);
127 
128     WorkflowInstance stoppedWorkflow = createNiceMock(WorkflowInstance.class);
129     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getId()).andReturn(stoppedWorkflowId);
130     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getTitle()).andReturn("Stopped Workflow");
131     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getDescription()).andReturn("A stopped workflow");
132     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getTemplate()).andReturn("fast");
133     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getMediaPackage()).andReturn(mp);
134     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getCreatorName()).andReturn("User2");
135     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getState()).andReturn(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState.STOPPED);
136     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getOperations()).andReturn(Lists.newArrayList(woi2));
137     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getConfigurationKeys()).andReturn(Sets.newHashSet("ijklm"));
138     expect(stoppedWorkflow.getConfiguration("ijklm")).andReturn("9000");
139     replay(stoppedWorkflow);
140 
141     WorkflowInstance startedStoppedWorkflow = createNiceMock(WorkflowInstance.class);
142     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getId()).andReturn(stoppedWorkflowId);
143     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getTitle()).andReturn("Stopped Workflow");
144     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getDescription()).andReturn("A stopped workflow");
145     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getTemplate()).andReturn("fast");
146     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getMediaPackage()).andReturn(mp);
147     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getCreatorName()).andReturn("User2");
148     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getState()).andReturn(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState.PAUSED);
149     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getOperations()).andReturn(Lists.newArrayList(woi2));
150     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getConfigurationKeys()).andReturn(Sets.newHashSet("abc"));
151     expect(startedStoppedWorkflow.getConfiguration("abc")).andReturn("123");
152     replay(startedStoppedWorkflow);
153 
154     WorkflowSet workflows = createNiceMock(WorkflowSet.class);
155     expect(workflows.getItems()).andReturn(Arrays.asList(runningWorkflow, stoppedWorkflow));
156     replay(workflows);
157 
158     // WorkflowService
159     WorkflowService ws = createNiceMock(WorkflowService.class);
160     //create
161     WorkflowDefinition fastWorkflowDefinition = new WorkflowDefinitionImpl();
162     expect(ws.getWorkflowDefinitionById("missing")).andThrow(new NotFoundException());
163     expect(ws.getWorkflowDefinitionById("fast")).andReturn(fastWorkflowDefinition);
164     expect(ws.start(eq(fastWorkflowDefinition), eq(mp), isNull(), anyObject())).andReturn(runningWorkflow);
165     expect(ws.start(eq(fastWorkflowDefinition), eq(mpWithRunningWorkflow), isNull(), anyObject())).andThrow(
166             new IllegalStateException("Illegal state msg"));
167     //runningWorkflowId
168     ws.remove(runningWorkflowId);
169     expectLastCall().andThrow(new WorkflowStateException());
170     expect(ws.getWorkflowById(runningWorkflowId)).andReturn(runningWorkflow).anyTimes();
171     //stoppedWorkflow
172     ws.remove(stoppedWorkflowId);
173     expectLastCall().andVoid();
174     expect(ws.getWorkflowById(stoppedWorkflowId)).andReturn(stoppedWorkflow);
175     expect(ws.getWorkflowById(stoppedWorkflowId)).andReturn(startedStoppedWorkflow);
176     //unauthorizedWorkflow
177     ws.remove(unauthorizedWorkflowId);
178     expectLastCall().andThrow(new UnauthorizedException(""));
179     expect(ws.getWorkflowById(unauthorizedWorkflowId)).andThrow(new UnauthorizedException(""));
180     //missingWorkflow
181     ws.remove(missingWorkflowId);
182     expectLastCall().andThrow(new NotFoundException());
183     expect(ws.getWorkflowById(missingWorkflowId)).andThrow(new NotFoundException());
184     replay(ws);
185     setWorkflowService(ws);
186 
187     // IndexService
188     IndexService is = createNiceMock(IndexService.class);
189     Event e = new Event();
190     Event eWithRunningWorkflow = new Event();
191     expect(is.getEvent(eq("missing"), anyObject())).andReturn(none());
192     expect(is.getEvent(eq("905672ed-181c-4d60-b7cd-02758f61e713"), anyObject())).andReturn(some(e));
193     expect(is.getEvent(eq("mediapackage-with-running-workflow"), anyObject())).andReturn(some(eWithRunningWorkflow));
194     expect(is.getEventMediapackage(e)).andReturn(mp);
195     expect(is.getEventMediapackage(eWithRunningWorkflow)).andReturn(mpWithRunningWorkflow);
196     replay(is);
197     setIndexService(is);
198   }
199 }
